games.name: CATAN
games.description: Collect and trade resources to build up the island of Catan in this modern classic.

games.name: Clank!
games.description: Claim your treasures but don't attract the dragon in this deck-building dungeon race.

games.name: Wingspan
games.description: Attract a beautiful and diverse collection of birds to your wildlife preserve.

games.name: Gloomhaven
games.description: Vanquish monsters with strategic cardplay. Fulfill your quest to leave your legacy!

games.name: Ark Nova
games.description: Plan and build a modern, scientifically managed zoo to support conservation projects.

games.name: Dune Imperium
games.description: Influence, intrigue, and combat in the universe of Dune.

games.name: Root
games.description: Decide the fate of the forest as woodland factions fight for contrasting goals.

games.name: Scythe
games.description: Five factions vie for dominance in a war-torn, mech-filled, dieselpunk 1920s Europe.

games.name: Axis & Allies 1942
games.description: It's Spring 1942, and the world is at war. Five major powers struggle for supremacy: Germany and Japan are aligned against the great alliance of the United Kingdom, the Soviet Union, and the United States.

games.name: Marvel Legendary
games.description: Assemble Marvel's finest Heroes to combat Masterminds and thwart their Schemes!

games.name: Star Wars: The Deckbuilding Game
games.description: The Rebels and Empire go head-to-head to eliminate one another's bases.

games.name: UNO
games.description: Get rid of your cards first, but don't forget to say 'UNO!'

games.name: Exploding Kittens
games.description: Ask for favors, attack friends, see the future- whatever it takes to avoid exploding!

games.name: The Royal Game of Ur
games.description: An ancient Sumerian game with alluring craftsmanship and speculated rules.

games.name: Yahtzee
games.description: Yes the dice are fickle, but score your combos strategically to max out on points.

games.name: Brass: Birmingham
games.description: Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.

games.name: Battleship
games.description: Detect the enemy fleet and sink it.

games.name: 7 Wonders
games.description: Draft cards to develop your ancient civilization and build its Wonder of the World.
